code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:5000'});export var fetchInvoices=function fetchInvoices(){return API.get('/invoices');};export var createInvoice=function createInvoice(newIvoice){return API.post('/invoices',newIvoice);};export var fetchInvoice=function fetchInvoice(id){return API.get("/invoices/".concat(id));};export var deleteInvoice=function deleteInvoice(id){return API.delete("/invoices/".concat(id));};export var updateInvoice=function updateInvoice(id,updatedInvoice){return API.put("/invoices/".concat(id),updatedInvoice);};export var updateInvoiceState=function updateInvoiceState(id){return API.patch("/invoices/".concat(id,"/invoiceStatus"));};export var signIn=function signIn(formData){return API.post('/user/signin',formData);};export var signUp=function signUp(formData){return API.post('/user/signup',formData);};
